description: STRING No. 23 // From 2017-06-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // ‘Token’ has the logo of the Ethereum blockchain painted in it’s center. It is floating in a blue and red stream. In the black spaces Jensen wrote the block-height of the Ethereum blockchain and the price of one ETH at the exact time where he finished the painting.
name: Token
